title: The Steam Man of the West
description: Join Frank Rude, Jr., and his gang of misfits as they conquer the Weird, Weird West. Along with his associates Denver Doll the Detective Queen, photographer Eadweard Muybridge, giant Charlie Bull, Bessie Little the Masked Rider, orphan PS and Solomon, the cat who loves water, they solve the mysteries of the Frozen Head, the Dragon of Dragon Creek, the Tablet of Destinies, an American Spring-Heeled Jack and more. With his trusty machine the Steam Man the unforgettable exploits of these daring adventurers turn history inside out.
author: Joseph A. Lovece
